message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $13,000 at this point.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $14,000 is the lowest I can go.  It's a fantastic deal for something of this value.
